Hero.name: Pablo Edu Diaz
Hero.title: Developer
Hero.bio1: Im Pablo Diaz, known online as Exudev. I have experience in software development as a full stack programmer, standing out in particular in the Backend area. In addition, I have skills in game design. My current focus is on the use of programming languages such as C# and Typescript. Currently, I have a role at Novosit, where I contribute to the development of the Prodoctivity software. I am a challenge enthusiast, and my ability to learn in an agile way is one of my strengths.
Hero.bio2: I am always willing to take on new challenges and learn new technologies in this constant and dynamic field. In addition to my career in software development, I have a variety of personal interests, including video games, horror movies, reading comics, and cultivating healthy habits through the gym. Currently, my residence is in Santo Domingo, where I continue my quest for knowledge and excellence in the world of programming.

Projects.heading: Few of my projects
Projects.parkingSpot: ParkingSpot is an innovative application designed to mitigate traffic congestion. Here i used, Node Js, Mongo DB, Vue and some other tools.
Projects.sinisterSix: It lets trainers build teams of 6 Pokemon, analyze type coverage, configure moves and held items. Done with Python, PokeAPI and React.
